description.value: When making Command Skill Tests, character can affect a number of targets up to 100x their Fellowship Bonus rather than 10x. If Character gives an order to their squad, the order's range is increased by 100m. Only effects non-hostile NPC's. Minions have +10 Loyalty. Command Tests in Social Conflicts get +10.
